body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.2 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Control panel improvements and new appwiz panel.
Restructurations of state handling in Direct3D.
Support for timer queue functions.
Many MSXML improvements.
Several fixes to Solaris support.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
